interactivity.requirements: Not a Friday 25 Ami Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " Divergence " from Ami Arakawa
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Visit Ami's dorm room on any day except Friday after all Requirements have been fulfilled.

progression.synopsis: Ami attack-hugs Sensei and tells him that she'll be starting her new job at the maid cafe soon. Cuddling with Sensei on the couch, she says that she was a little hurt when he didn't object to her starting work — she felt that he didn't need her. However, she says that she intends to become the kind of girl he wants her to be. Sensei admits that he cares about Ami, although he declines her suggestion of staying the night on the grounds that Maya would kill both of them in their sleep. He does agree to go shopping with her and Maya for winter clothes sometime, however.
trivia: There is some variation in the conversation depending on the nature of Sensei's relationship with Ami.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.10p2.
